rooms.description: Art Deco styled entrance with grand staircase leading to upper floor; includes reception area.
Spacious living room with Art Dece motifs, natural light and large windows following Vastu principles for positive energy.
Integrated dining area adjoining the living room; design optimized for social interactions and good air circulation per local norms.
Functional kitchen with modern amenities while preserving Art Deco elegance; positioned in accordance with Vastu guidelines ensuring cleanliness and energy flow.
Primary bedroom with ensuite bathroom, designed with privacy in mind and decorated in Art Deco style; placed in the north-east corner as per Vastu for prosperity.
Secondary bedroom with attached balcony for natural ventilation; interior follows Art Deco geometric patterns.
Additional bedroom in the duplex layout, ensuring ample light and privacy.
Dedicated study area integrated within living space; designed with modern furnishing while respecting Vastu orientation for focus and productivity.

openings.description: Main entrance door styled in Art Deco fashion, positioned centrally to invite positive energy.
Large window ensuring ample natural light; designed following Vastu recommendations for illumination and air circulation.

additional_spaces.description: Exclusive home theater with state-of-the-art sound and lighting systems, integrated into the duplex's upper floor for privacy and entertainment. Designed using Art Deco aesthetics with a modern twist.
Separate servant quarters designed to provide comfort and efficiency, ensuring functional space while maintaining style.
In-ground swimming pool with Art Deco inspired design details, integrated into the landscaping and accessible from both levels.
